author: Mike Butcher
title: UK’s National Health Service launches £500,000 COVID19 tech competition
description: The fund will concentrate on tech initiatives that help people with mental health support and those with social care needs, and support for those who may be most affected by the consequences of remaining housebound for long periods of time. This competition i…
content: The innovation arm of the UKs National Health Service, NHSx has launched a £500,000 funding competition for innovators and startups who can find digital ways to support people in need during the Coronavirus outbreak. The fund will concentrate on tech initiati… [+3412 chars]
